mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.CREATEDATE , A.CUMID FROM NoticeBoard A WHERE A.ISDELETED = 'N' ORDER BY A.CREATEDATE DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATEDATE , A.MODIFYDATE , A.ISDELETED , A.CUMID , B.THUMBNAIL FROM NoticeBoard A LEFT JOIN NoticeBoardImage B ON (A.ID = B.POSTID) WHERE A.ID = #{id}

SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATEDATE , A.MODIFYDATE , A.ISDELETED , A.CUMID , B.THUMBNAIL FROM NoticeBoard A LEFT JOIN NoticeBoardImage B ON (A.ID = B.POSTID) WHERE A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');

SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATEDATE , A.MODIFYDATE , A.ISDELETED , A.CUMID , B.THUMBNAIL FROM NoticeBoard A LEFT JOIN NoticeBoardImage B ON (A.ID = B.POSTID) WHERE A.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');

SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.CREATEDATE , A.MODIFYDATE , A.ISDELETED , A.CUMID , B.THUMBNAIL FROM NoticeBoard A LEFT JOIN NoticeBoardImage B ON (A.ID = B.POSTID) WHERE A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR A.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%');
